ComicInfo.Title: The Sexiest Face On Earth!
ComicInfo.Summary: Willie's former school, California Central, needs a new mascot for their sports events. And ALF is happy to volunteer in "Be of Good Cheer." Then ALF tells Willie and Kate about the terrible things that happened when his family on Melmac won a lottery in "That's the Ticket." And in "Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow," ALF and the Tanners have to deal with ALF going through the Melmac shed cycle.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 20:38:01. [CVDB56904]
ComicInfo.Characters: ALF, Augie Shumway, Bob Shumway, Brian Tanner, Curtis Shumway, Flo Shumway, Lynn Tanner, Raquel Ochmonek, Trevor Ochmonek, Willie Tanner
